channel.title: My mopar download keeps opening in bitzipper and has only .txt files?
channel.description: same as title. i dont even own bitzipper. its nowhere on my computer. i completely uninstalled it. keeps trying to open it with bitzipper, and not with anyhting else. also, every single thing is .txt, no .zip or anything any help?

then download a different version of mopar, like from the actual website…
